Package com.pratima.todoly

Class FileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pratima.todoly.FileManager
  • public class FileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads and Writes to/from file. Uses object serialization format to write and read. This also creates singleton for reuse of the file handlers.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    pratimashegokar
